channel.title: Plz plz someone help plz plz
channel.description: i dont kno what to do :mad: when i enter a username and password it says "error connecting to server, must be dow" blah blah blah.. it says it even when i start a new one!!! plz someone help

item.title: Plz plz someone help plz plz
item.dc:creator: @steve4448 steve4448
item.description:
@steve4448 wrote:

well if its even happening when ur pressing “start server” then somthing must be wrong with your moparscape because hybirdscape (the server u log into witch no 1 can get on with you) is never offline

item.title: Plz plz someone help plz plz
item.dc:creator: @luke12345 luke12345
item.description:
@luke12345 wrote:

have you got your server running at the same time???
if so them type in the server section localhost and it should join!!!
if not then i dont know maybe it might be your firewall make a port in your firewall for the client to acess and then it might work.

if u havent got a server and your just trying to conect to some ones server them its either the server is down or its just your firewall in most cases its your firewall stopping it gain acess so just create a port for it and let it have acess and it should work if none of that help then i have no idea.
luke

Read full topic
